title: [FEATURE] SKCanvas.DrawText support Span<byte>/Memory<byte>
body:
**Is your feature request related to a problem? Please describe.**
Performance improvement. Drawing a line of a document would allocate (because a sub array/string is needed).

This can be avoided by passing `Span<byte/char>` or `Memory<byte/char>`.

**Describe the solution you'd like**
add overloads for Span and Memory where appropriate.

**Describe alternatives you've considered**
using the TextBlobBuilder seems to be a lot more complicated. If there is a better way to do what I want please let me know. 

**Additional context**
I'm trying to build a simple text editor control that utilises Skia as a rendering backend.
